meanings.definition: A person or group that is granted the right to operate a business using the trademark, products, and business model of a larger company.
meanings.sent1: The franchisees opened a new store in the mall.
meanings.sent2: Many franchisees are excited to start their own businesses.
meanings.sent3: The franchisees decided to have a pizza party at their store.
meanings.sent4: Like bees in a hive, franchisees work together for success.
meanings.sent5: The franchisees proudly displayed the company logo on their storefront.

meanings.definition: The individuals or entities that have purchased the right to operate a franchise.
meanings.sent1: Our franchisees are dedicated to providing excellent service.
meanings.sent2: The franchisees attended a training session to learn more about the business.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, the franchisees joked about opening a theme park.
meanings.sent4: The franchisees are the stars of the business constellation.
meanings.sent5: With determination, the franchisees grew their businesses beyond expectations.
